name: FeatureBento
description: Feature section with bento-style cards displaying interactive visualizations (globe, charts, 3D cards, map).

description.example: Discover the tools and capabilities that make our platform powerful

buttonRules.note: Button variant is controlled by ThemeProvider's defaultButtonVariant.

featureRules.note: Array of feature cards. Each card has title, description, optional button, and a bentoComponent type with its specific props.

bentoComponentTypes.icon-info-cards: Scrolling metric cards - requires items: BentoInfoItem[] with icon, label, value
bentoComponentTypes.3d-stack-cards: Three stacked notification cards - requires items: [Bento3DItem, Bento3DItem, Bento3DItem]
bentoComponentTypes.3d-task-list: Rotated task list card - requires items: TaskItem[]
bentoComponentTypes.orbiting-icons: Orbiting integration icons on rings - requires centerIcon and items: OrbitingItem[]
bentoComponentTypes.marquee: Scrolling text/icon rows - requires centerIcon and variant ('text' with texts[] or 'icon' with icons[])
bentoComponentTypes.map: World map with animated location markers
bentoComponentTypes.line-chart: Area line chart with gradient fill
bentoComponentTypes.3d-card-grid: 3D card grid - requires items (4 items with name and icon) and centerIcon
bentoComponentTypes.phone: Interactive phone mockup with notification animation - requires statusIcon, alertIcon, alertTitle, alertMessage, apps
bentoComponentTypes.chat: Chat animation - requires aiIcon, userIcon, exchanges, placeholder
bentoComponentTypes.timeline: Timeline visualization - requires heading, subheading, items (3), completedLabel
bentoComponentTypes.media-stack: Three stacked images/videos that fan out on hover - requires items: [MediaStackItem, MediaStackItem, MediaStackItem]

usageExample:
<ThemeProvider defaultButtonVariant="icon-arrow" borderRadius="rounded">
  <FeatureBento
    title="Our Features"
    description="Discover the tools that make our platform powerful."
    tag="Features"
    tagIcon={Sparkles}
    textboxLayout="default"
    useInvertedBackground="none"
    animationType="fade"
    features={[
      { title: "Global Reach", description: "Connect worldwide.", bentoComponent: "globe" },
      { title: "Analytics", description: "Track metrics live.", bentoComponent: "line-chart" },
      { title: "Location", description: "See your users.", bentoComponent: "map" }
    ]}
  />
</ThemeProvider>
do: Use for showcasing features with interactive visualizations
Use appropriate bentoComponent for each feature type
Provide all required props for each bentoComponent type
Best for modern landing pages showcasing platform capabilities
dont: Do not use without proper items for bento types that require them
Do not use for simple text-only feature lists
Do not use the same bentoComponent type for multiple features - each feature should have a unique visualization
